name: WordJong Party
description: The smash online and DS puzzler WordJong is coming to Wii with all-new multiplayer modes, gorgeous new visuals and more! Use a set of lettered tiles to create words and clear the board in both single-player & intense 4-player modes. WordJong Party boasts several new features exclusive to the Wii including four-player Party Mode, new power-ups, an enhanced Solo Mode, and more!
